amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in part A of House Report 107-450 to permanently prohibit the use of funds to develop, test or engineer a nuclear earth penetrator weapon and prohibits FY 2003 funds for a feasibility study of a nuclear earth penetrator weapon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 243 (Roll no. 141).
